V社又一经典之作，难度合适，通关还是很轻松的，关卡设置有趣，只是很多时候穿过传送门是视角变化让人头晕，游戏中的AI和机枪炮台太可爱了，你拿起机枪炮台时它会说“放我下来”，它倒地后还会说“哎呀”，不过确实有点短，不知不觉玩了几个小时就通关了，不过这几天打折很便宜，大家可以买来玩一玩。

7/10
One of the best games ever made.

Portal is a Valve classic, a solid 10/10. Some of the maps took me a while to figure out, but I had a very good time playing it through. I read in a lot of other reviews that this game was good but to short. I agree that there’s not many levels, but with the challenge maps, there’s a lot to do. I think that most reviewers skipped out on that one. It took me 14 hours to complete them all, and my opinion is that there’s plenty to do for the price tag. 

If you like puzzle games you should try this out. May not fall in everyone's taste but the cheap price tag, especially on sale, rule out  your excuses.
Игра на один раз, довольно короткая игра. не хватает эффектности, играл совершенно не напрягаясь. 6 из 10 тортиков

This game is very epic

A very fun game.
The storyline was very intriguing, though I actually didn't know there was one until about half way through the game.
Definitely worth the money, no regrets.
Would highly recommend this game to anyone.

You basically place portals and solve puzzles, but there is a darker secret hiding behind the scenes.
Knowing that there was more to the game than met the eye kept me interested all the way through.

I also found it very nice that it is able to run well on low end machines while still getting over 60 FPS.
The Cake Isn't A lie, just eat it, its delicious
め　い　さ　く

I bought this game two years ago as of today. When I first got it, i dismissed it as another stupid puzzle game, and altogether forgot about it. Two years later, after coming back to pc gaming, i saw it in my steam library and decided to give it another shot. This is now one of my favorite games of all time. The writing, story, and voice acting is out of this world, and has aged amazingly. I cannot express how much love I have for this game. Score: 5/5. If you've played half life but not this, you'll get a very interesting half life refrence at the end.
Fuken Great

It's Portal. It's a classic for a reason. It's pretty quick to get through, and it's a game everyone should experience. Great humor, fantastic puzzles, and the unique portal mechanic make this one that will be remembered fondly for years to come.
dis game is friggin awesome
The only reason this isn't the best puzzle game of all time is because the sequel is better.

A great strategy game. I would highly recommend getting the portal bundle due to it including portal 2, if you want to play that as well.

I bought this game because I had already played portal 2. Personally, portal 2 is waay better because it has more features and is a longer game but Portal is still a fun game. It introduces you to GLaDOS and you get some looks at the original facility. Whether you have already played portal 2 or not, give this game a try, because it is a quite fun puzzler.

Sehr Positiv.

Portal is an excellent puzzle-based game and I would absolutely recommend this game to just about anybody. I'm not a fan of puzzle games, but the Portal series is an exception. Portal has a good story sprinkled with dry humor and unique gameplay. That being said, if you can only purchase one game, go with Portal 2. This game, as spectacular as it is, seems more like a prototype to the masterpiece named Portal 2.
Атлишнаа
Fantastic experience. Both writing and level design are top-notch. No idea why I was waiting so long to get this game. Highly recommended!
